Title: OneSmart International Education Group Ltd.
Business: We are the largest premium K-12 after-school education service provider in China in terms of revenue in 2016 and 2017, according to Frost & Sullivan. We have built a comprehensive K-12 after-school education platform that encompasses our acclaimed premium tutoring services, premium young children education services and language and culture programs. In 2017, we had the largest market share of 2.4% in China’s premium K-12 after-school education market, as measured by revenues, according to Frost & Sullivan. We operated a nationwide network of 225 study centers across 42 cities in China as of November 30, 2017.
